Name: DUMB FIGHT
About the game: 'Dumb Fight' is a local multiplayer party game(NO SINGLE PLAYER MODE) . Players have to control all kinds of dumb and funny-looking babies to beat off opponents by punch gun for becoming the last big winner! Your keyboard can provide up to 4 players, to play with 8 players, you will only need 4 extra controllers. Or you may also play with 8 controllers. (Keyboard controlling Guideline) Supports Remote Play Together All you need is one pack of 《DUMB FIGHT》, friends can play with you remotely. Please look at here for more information Super smash battel, non-stop enjoyment from 2-8 players.ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ Having an exciting and happy battle with your buddies diving in a coach in a cozy afternoon. Continue framing others in ghost mode even when you are out.ﾍ(ﾟ∀ﾟﾍ) As a ghost, eating blocks, possessing others are just a piece of cake. Extremely intense stage effect, disaster is nothing special.(⁰▿⁰) Devastating effect is coming anytime, anywhere, all kinds of object would be destroyed, watch out not get yourself in trouble! Team mode, your skillful friend need to be punished.(ಠ౪ಠ) What to do with the top player? This game provides free team mode, one v.s a Team is not a dream anymore. Features 2 to 8 players locally (NO SINGLE PLAYER MODE) Support 8 controllers and 1 keyboard Unique ghost mode Full stage environment destruction Cute and hilarious characters Eazy to control Team competition Physics-Based Combat System Multiple game modes Multiple stage theme
